columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the specified framework.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the framework.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identified for the specified framework.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The framework type, such as standard or custom.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Specifies when the framework was created.

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: The IAM user or role that created the framework.

columns.name: compliance_type
columns.description: The compliance type that the new custom framework supports, such as CIS or HIPAA.

columns.name: controls_count
columns.description: The number of controls associated with the specified framework.

columns.name: control_sets_count
columns.description: The number of control sets associated with the specified framework.

columns.name: control_sources
columns.description: The sources from which AWS Audit Manager collects evidence for the control.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the specified framework.

columns.name: last_updated_at
columns.description: Specifies when the framework was most recently updated.

columns.name: last_updated_by
columns.description: The IAM user or role that most recently updated the framework.

columns.name: logo
columns.description: The logo associated with the framework.

columns.name: control_sets
columns.description: The control sets associated with the framework.
